thread.title: Ed Sheeran will be making a cameo on the new series of Game Of Thrones producers confirm at SXSW
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran will be making a cameo on the new series of Game Of Thrones producers confirm at SXSW

author: jesswalfordmetro
title: Ed Sheeran will be making a cameo on the new series of Game Of Thrones producers confirm at SXSW
text:
Ed and Jon Snow in one show? Yum. (Picture: Getty/ HBO Ed Sheeran is potentially on his way to Westeros – after Game Of Thrones producers confirmed he would be making a cameo in the hit HBO show.
Ed Sheeran to guest star in Game Of Thrones and 11 other things we learned from SXSW Stark sisters Maisie Williams and Sophie Turner were moderating a panel at the South By Southwest panel in Austin, Texas when executive producers David Benioff, D.B. Weiss announced the news.
They said: ‘For years, we tried to get Ed Sheeran on the show to surprise Maisie, and this year we finally did it.’

And fans of the show couldn’t quite believe it:
Ed Sheeran (legend) is going to be on Game of Thrones this season. What a time to be alive
— Tyler (@t_pipess) March 12, 2017 
@edsheeran on #GameofThrones 
Me: pic.twitter.com/4cFGQxladT 
— vincent van ghoe (@lanasprayer) March 12, 2017 
Ed Sheeran acting in Game of Thrones like "Winterfell isn't the best place to find a lover so King's Landing is where i go ♪"
— claire ❀ (@twerkingthorin) March 12, 2017 
I'm not ready to see ed sheeran get killed off in game of thrones
— Osha (@oshawildling) March 12, 2017 
ED SHEERAN ON GAME OF THRONES I'M BLESSED
— inês is not @ PAX (@ShimmyShammyy) March 12, 2017 

It’s believed the Shape Of You singer will appear in the seventh and penultimate series of the HBO show which airs in July.
Let’s hope he’s one of the lucky ones who makes it out alive, hey.
But if Ed’s not your cuppa tea, here are 11 other things we learned from the panel in the US. 
More: TV The Jump 2017: The series winner has been crowned 
The Voice 2017: Here's who is in the quarter-finals 
Netflix hit Riverdale has been renewed for a second series 
The news comes just days after the show announced a much earlier release date for the series than fans had first thought – but Ser Davros maybe did give the game away. 
So far, fans of the hit telly show have a teaser poster to go by – featuring a very important sword .
And a trailer for the show hints at something very big happening .
Game Of Thrones season seven will air on July 16 on HBO.
